Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2018 10:45AM nrioffe wrote: I was recently diagnosed so I understand the emotional Rollercoaster. Thankfully where I live i had 3 core biopsies performed within a day and results given to me within 24 hours. I had mammo guided, CT guided and ultrasound guided core biopsies. I had stage 1 and DCIS all on left breast.  Definitely get the right biopsy and hopefully you get answers soon! Playing the waiting game is no fun!
